content: विपच् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To mature, develop, ripen; bear fruit; (समारंभाः) गर्भशालिसधर्माणस्तस्य गूढं विपेचिरे <ls>R. 17. 53.</ls> {@--2@} To digest. {@--3@} To cook thoroughly. {@--4@} To melt, dissolve, liquefy. {@--5@} To roast. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cook thoroughly. {@--2@} To melt, liquefy.
